Nya!

Konichiwa!

Welcome to Kawaii Neko!

We are working to make the world a more kawaii place ... one box at a time. We offer a monthly based subscription service that brings the best of Japan to your doorstep. Each month, you recieve a box filled with handpicked items specially curated by our partners at Sumikko Gurashi.

Details

Past Boxes

Accesories

Stationary

Plushies

A uniqually curated experience

This isn't your typical subscription box. Each box is uniquely chosen based on your specific interests.No fluff (unless you want it! ).

The subscription period can be as long or as short as you like. Boxes are sent monthly and are filled with both popular and limited release items from San-X's Sumikko Gurashi line. Thus making these boxes the perfect tool for adding to your collection or sending a thoughtful gift. Products range from full size plushies to themed stationary.

If a month is too long too wait, you can also enjoy the fun of Sumikko Gurashi by playing their latest game on the Nintendo Switch!
